triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: cvc5 is an SMT solver that addresses satisfiability modulo theories problems.

triples.name: Cooperating Validity Checker
triples.relevance: cvc5 is the latest solver in the CVC series and builds on the CVC4 codebase.

triples.name: Z3 Theorem Prover
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates cvc5 performance against Z3, a competing SMT solver from Microsoft.

triples.name: Benchmark
triples.relevance: cvc5 is evaluated on benchmarks from SMT-LIB, the standard benchmark suite for SMT solvers.
